underlying_goal: Create a detailed implementation specification for adding new sandbagging prompts identified in a literature review.
primary_success: Effectively used the 'spec-interview' skill to autonomously research the existing codebase, identify gaps, propose a clear plan, and interactively refine the final specification with the user.
brief_summary: Using the spec-interview skill, the agent analyzed a literature review document and the existing codebase to determine which sandbagging prompts were missing. It proposed a clear implementation plan, engaged the user with clarifying questions to resolve ambiguities, and then generated a complete specification document (`specs/add-lit-review-prompts.md`) for the work.
